product.title: Beauty and the Beast | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.ingress:
One of the most meaningful storylines in children’s literature, this imaginative classic follows the adventures of Belle, a beautiful bookworm who goes looking for her missing father and discovers that he’s been trapped in a spooky castle. Sacrificing her own freedom for her father’s, Belle finds herself held captive by the terrifying Beast. Over time, the two become close friends. Prompted by Belle’s love and kindness, the Beast’s true heroic nature emerges. This story stresses the importance of never judging others by their appearances and encourages the reader to seek out friendships in even the most unlikely places.

Tie-in Activity: Host a tea party inspired by the one Belle enjoys with the Beast. Show kids the proper way to set the table, let them pour the refreshments of choice, and encourage them to demonstrate good table manners. Invite their favorite stuffed animals if you need extra guests.
